title: Side Effects of the Creative Process
description:
This week, I do a deep dive into the how-to of bringing an idea to fruition.

Pick up your copy of my book Small Doses: Potent Truths for Every Day Use at a bookstore near you!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
